featured.text: Different airlines have different _____ for carry-on luggage, but many international airlines limit a carry-on piece to 7 kilograms.

definition.zh_def: 行李，指旅行時攜帶的包裝物品。
definition.en_def: Bags, suitcases, or other items used to carry personal belongings while traveling.
definition.example: She packed her luggage carefully before the trip.
